title: Investigation User Reviews FRO to Determine the Level of Customer Loyalty Model Shahrvand Chain Stores. (arXiv:2306.06150v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: In this study, focusing on organizations in a rapid-response component model (FRO), the relative importance of each one, from the point of view of customers and their impact on the purchase of Shahrvand chain stores determined to directors and managers of the shops, according to customer needs and their priorities in order to satisfy the customers and take steps to strengthen their competitiveness. For this purpose, all shahrvand chain stores in Tehran currently have 10 stores in different parts of Tehran that have been studied are that of the 10 branches; Five branches were selected. The sampling method is used in this study population with a confidence level of 95% and 8% error; 150 are more specifically typically 30 were studied in each branch. In this study, a standard questionnaire of 26 questions which is used FRO validity using Cronbach's alpha values of "0/95" is obtained. The results showed that each of the six factors on customer loyalty model FRO effective Shahrvand chain st

Title: Investigation User Reviews FRO to Determine the Level of Customer Loyalty Model Shahrvand Chain Stores. (arXiv:2306.06150v1 [econ.GN])
Abstract: In this study, focusing on organizations in a rapid-response component model (FRO), the relative importance of each one, from the point of view of customers and their impact on the purchase of Shahrvand chain stores determined to directors and managers of the shops, according to customer needs and their priorities in order to satisfy the customers and take steps to strengthen their competitiveness. For this purpose, all shahrvand chain stores in Tehran currently have 10 stores in different parts of Tehran that have been studied are that of the 10 branches; Five branches were selected. The sampling method is used in this study population with a confidence level of 95% and 8% error; 150 are more specifically typically 30 were studied in each branch. In this study, a standard questionnaire of 26 questions which is used FRO validity using Cronbach's alpha values of "0/95" is obtained. The results showed that each of the six factors on customer loyalty model FRO effective Shahrvand chain st
translated_title: 调查用户评价以确定FRO模型下沙赫尔万连锁店的客户忠诚度水平
translated_abstract: 本研究聚焦于FRO组织中的连锁店，确定沙赫尔万连锁店各个组成部分从客户角度的相对重要性及其对购买的影响，以满足客户需求并采取措施加强竞争力。研究发现，6个因素对FRO模型下的沙赫尔万连锁店的客户忠诚度有重要影响，其中最重要的因素是商品和服务的质量。
tldr: 本研究通过调查用户评价，确定了影响沙赫尔万连锁店客户忠诚度的6个因素，其中商品和服务质量最为关键。
en_tdlr: This study investigates user reviews to determine the factors influencing customer loyalty at Shahrvand chain stores under the FRO model, and identifies that the quality of goods and services is the most important factor.
